sentences.en: A amiable man is usually willing to make an amicable settlement.
sentences.cn: 禀性温良的人通常都愿意与人和解.

sentences.en: A recurrence of such an oversight could impair our amicable relations.
sentences.cn: 这样的疏忽倘若再发生,可能有损双方的友好贸易关系.

sentences.en: Can't we fix this up now in some amicable way?
sentences.cn: 我们现在能够用友好的态度把这件事情商妥 吗 ?

sentences.en: Maintain amicable and co - operative working relations with other departments in the Hotel.
sentences.cn: 与酒店中的其他部门保持愉快、合作的工作关系.

sentences.en: Our discussions were amicable and productive.
sentences.cn: 我们的讨论气氛非常友好并且富有成果。

sentences.en: So everyone put their heads together and eventually an amicable arrangement was reached.
sentences.cn: 因此大家集思广益，最终作出了妥善的安排。

sentences.en: Spectacular amicable agreement will allow Jerry Yang as a graceful exIt'signs.
sentences.cn: 引人注目的友好协议将允许杨致远作为优雅退出的标志.

sentences.en: The meeting ended on reasonably amicable terms.
sentences.cn: 会议在较为友好的气氛中结束了。

sentences.en: The two countries made settlement by amicable arrangement.
sentences.cn: 两国以友好调解解决争端.

sentences.en: The two nations reached an amicable agreement.
sentences.cn: 两国达成了一项友好协议.

sentences.en: The two nations settled their quarrel in an amicable way.
sentences.cn: 两国以和睦友好的方式解决了他们的争端.

sentences.en: Their relationship hasn’t always been amicable.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系不是一直都很和睦。

sentences.en: Unwedding ceremony acknowledges their shared life and marks their amicable separation.
sentences.cn: 离婚仪式承认彼此曾经共同拥有的生活,并且表示出他们彼此和睦的分离.

sentences.en: We came to an amicable agreement.
sentences.cn: 我们达成了友好的协议.

sentences.en: We had an amicable divorce and remained in contact.
sentences.cn: 我们最终友好分手,至今仍保持联系.

words.tran_cn: 友好的,易接近的,深情的
怡人的,好脾气的,迷人的

trans.tran_cn: 友好的，温和的，和睦的，友善的
trans.tran_en: an amicable agreement, relationship etc is one in which people feel friendly towards each other and do not want to quarrel
